Functions

NAMESPACE_FDO_COMMANDS_NETWORK::INetworkReader * Execute ()
 This method performs the network analysis and returns a network path reader.
__property System::Double get_MaximumCost ()
 This method is used to get the maximum cost value.
__property System::Int32 get_MaximumDepth ()
 Gets the maximum depth value.
__property System::String * get_NetworkLayerName ()
 Gets the name of the class to be operated upon as an FdoIdentifier.
__property System::Void set_MaximumCost (System::Double value)
 This method is used to set an optional maximum cost value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given cost.
__property System::Void set_MaximumDepth (System::Int32 value)
 This method is used to set an optional maximum depth value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given depth. A depth of 1 limits the analysis to the adjacent nodes.
__property System::Void set_NetworkLayerName (System::String *value)
 This method is used to set the name of the layer that will be used for the network analysis. If the layer is not set, the analysis will be performed across all layers.
__property System::Void set_NetworkName (System::String *value)
 This method is used to set the name of the network that will be used for the network analysis.
System::Void SetExcludeNodes (System::String *className, NAMESPACE_FDO_FILTER::Filter *filter)
 This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that need to be excluded.
System::Void SetIncludeNodes (System::String *className, NAMESPACE_FDO_FILTER::Filter *filter)
 This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that need to be included.
